issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Stomp client hang after a long time pending

comments.body: It looks like a socket timeout problem. You can try increasing that time, but generally the better solution is to have a kind of a "keep alive" protocol. It is planed for Stomp v1.1. Until then you can send some dummy messages periodically to keep connection alive. Hope this helps.
without keep alive support of stomp, we could send some period msg to simulate keep alive.
